segments.text: Hello , what can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , I come to pay my water and electricity fees .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Give me your water and electricity bills , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You should pay 160 yuan for the electricity fee and 80 yuan for the water fee .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you mean that I should pay 240 yuan in total ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Will you pay by cash or credit card ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Cash , please . Here is the money .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I get 250 yuan from you , and this is the change , 10 yuan .
segments.speaker: S1
